entry.title: COVID-19 & the State of Michigan
entry.summary: Wednesday 3/18/2020: Governor Whitmer was a guest on Monday's Morning Joe program. During the discussion she mentioned the following:The State of Michigan declared a State…
entry.content:
Wednesday 3/18/2020: 
Governor Whitmer was a guest on Monday's Morning Joe program.  During the discussion she mentioned the following:
  • The State of Michigan declared a State of Emergancy before the national government did
  • Michigan processes 100 COVID-19 tests a day; however more kits and chemicals are needed
  • The State has reached out to private firms to manufacturer medical gowns and other needs

entry.content:

May we find, design, and/or build a solution for you? If so, please contact us. 313.348.9400
